title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Importance of experimental methods, similitude laws and design of experiments, some simple measuring instruments, brittle coatings Strain gages - principles and applications, mechanical, optical and electrical strain gages, semiconductor strain gages, strain recording instruments. Photoelasticity - Two dimensional stress analysis, principles and applications. Moire techniques; Non-destructive testing; Use of Laser for stress measurement. Transducers LVDT, piezoelectric sensors, accelerometers, load cells etc.
